    Overview: Hybrid OA data

Overview: Hybrid OA data

Source: vignettes/overview.Rmd
overview.Rmd
library(hoaddata)

Datasets

This package provides the following data tables.

oam_hybrid_jns

Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor. Data were gathered from https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM and enriched with ISSN variants.

oam_hybrid_jns
#> # A tibble: 10,765 × 3
#>    vertrag     issn_l    issn     
#>    <chr>       <chr>     <chr>    
#>  1 ACM (hebis) 0360-0300 0360-0300
#>  2 ACM (hebis) 0360-0300 1557-7341
#>  3 ACM (hebis) 1550-4832 1550-4832
#>  4 ACM (hebis) 1550-4832 1550-4840
#>  5 ACM (hebis) 1936-7236 1936-7228
#>  6 ACM (hebis) 1936-7236 1936-7236
#>  7 ACM (hebis) 1549-6325 1549-6325
#>  8 ACM (hebis) 1549-6325 1549-6333
#>  9 ACM (hebis) 1544-3558 1544-3558
#> 10 ACM (hebis) 1544-3558 1544-3965
#> # … with 10,755 more rows

cc_jn_ind

Aggregated data about the prevalence of Creative Commons license variants by year and hybrid journal as obtained from Crossref.

cc_jn_ind
#> # A tibble: 42,416 × 6
#>    issn_l    cr_year cc          cc_total jn_all    prop
#>    <chr>     <fct>   <fct>          <dbl>  <int>   <dbl>
#>  1 0009-4536 2019    NA                 0    256 0      
#>  2 0032-3888 2019    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  3 0253-2964 2021    CC BY              1    256 0.00391
#>  4 0253-2964 2021    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  5 1124-4909 2021    CC BY-NC-ND        1    256 0.00391
#>  6 1359-4184 2018    CC BY-SA           1    256 0.00391
#>  7 0021-4922 2022    CC BY              2    256 0.00781
#>  8 2058-9883 2019    CC BY-NC           2    256 0.00781
#>  9 0006-3592 2018    CC BY-NC           3    256 0.0117 
#> 10 1359-4184 2018    CC BY-NC-ND        3    256 0.0117 
#> # … with 42,406 more rows

cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind

First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license

cc_openalex_inst_jn_ind
#> # A tibble: 616,798 × 6
#>    issn_l    cr_year country_code cc    articles_under_cc_variant articles_total
#>    <chr>       <int> <chr>        <chr>                     <int>          <int>
#>  1 0957-4522    2022 BD           NA                            2              2
#>  2 0295-5075    2022 UA           NA                            1              1
#>  3 0141-9838    2022 SA           NA                            1              1
#>  4 2050-7526    2022 LU           NA                            1              1
#>  5 0947-6539    2022 FI           CC BY                         1              1
#>  6 1385-3457    2022 ID           NA                            1              1
#>  7 0305-7410    2022 SG           NA                            1              1
#>  8 1040-7294    2022 CO           NA                            1              1
#>  9 0032-3888    2022 UA           NA                            1              1
#> 10 1040-0400    2022 MY           NA                            1              1
#> # … with 616,788 more rows

cc_openalex_inst

Article-level affiliation data from first authors as obtained from OpenAlex.

cc_openalex_inst
#> # A tibble: 330,551 × 7
#>    doi                     issn_l  cr_year cc    country_code id    display_name
#>    <chr>                   <chr>     <int> <chr> <chr>        <chr> <chr>       
#>  1 10.1002/1438-390x.1017  1438-3…    2019 CC BY AT           http… Universität…
#>  2 10.1002/1438-390x.1019  1438-3…    2019 CC B… US           http… United Stat…
#>  3 10.1002/1438-390x.12015 1438-3…    2019 CC B… PL           http… Mammal Rese…
#>  4 10.1002/1438-390x.12016 1438-3…    2019 CC B… JP           http… Kwansei Gak…
#>  5 10.1002/1438-390x.12018 1438-3…    2019 CC B… JP           http… Okinawa Ins…
#>  6 10.1002/1438-390x.12018 1438-3…    2019 CC B… JP           http… Japan Socie…
#>  7 10.1002/1438-390x.12019 1438-3…    2019 CC BY NA           NA    Statistical…
#>  8 10.1002/1438-390x.12021 1438-3…    2019 CC BY US           http… Duke Univer…
